movie_night.title: There aren’t a lot of movies about pen shows, but there are plenty of movies about obsessive nerdery. It matters not how you nerd out, merely that you nerd well and often.

score.title: A Storm is Brewing
paragraphs: The earth groans as plates collide. Overhead, the sky darkens as thick clouds, heavy with rain, roll in. The air is charged. The pressure is dropping.

On the horizon, silhouetted against a lead-colored sky, is a line of men and women. Among them are kings and queens, warriors and poets. Some come to do battle, some to gain untold riches. Some would betray their beliefs for silver, others would die defending theirs against impossible odds.
The storm is here. Great armies will clash.
It’s time for the pen show.
